text: Hymenophyllum sodiroi is a species of fern in the family Hymenophyllaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== sodiroi Category:Ferns of Ecuador Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Ferns of the Americas Category:Data deficient plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hymenophyllum sodiroi
